Notes: A controller that activates and deactivates SW_A periodically. It will play a constant ticking noise.

Obj_arg0.Name: Activated Time
Obj_arg0.Description: How long it takes before SW_A gets deactivated again. Default is 60.

Obj_arg1.Name: Deactivated Time
Obj_arg1.Description: How long it takes before SW_A gets activated again. Matches Obj_arg0 by default.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will start to function when this switch is activated.
